Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They're looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vipin's family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the Greater Toronto Area.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Phil and Aubree, a newly wed couple, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Deputies assist arresting officers by removing an angry man from their patrol car. Violent outbursts plague an arrest. One woman struggles with bail. Three drunk men become wildly emotional.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After cutting her head, a woman bites and kicks deputies. To investigate potential hidden meanings, a man’s tattoos are examined. A confused man is found with illegal mushrooms at a bus stop.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Inmates are subdued after exhibiting unruly behavior. Anger drives emotions as a man accuses officers of racial profiling. An officer uses “verbal judo” to gain the upper hand with combative inmates.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman who was nabbed for jaywalking claims the police were out of line for arresting her. A woman is brought in on domestic-violence charges, and a drug peddler claims he's selling to support his addiction to poker.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Deputies corral a suspect into a cell after serious turmoil. A man becomes suicidal after being brought in on burglary charges. Facing the gavel, a prisoner berates a Judge during court proceedings.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 I'm Not Jane Doe
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a lewd woman is jailed. In Las Vegas, NV a man is placed in the restraining chair after attempting to bite his own fingers off. In Portland, OR a man is brought in for possession. In Sarasota, FL a homeless man is brought in for trespassing and battery.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a truculent man is sent to the drunk-tank to sober up. In Portland, OR a drunk woman is jailed for attacking a child. In Sarasota, FL an intoxicated man has difficulty recalling why he's been arrested. In Spokane, WA a man "borrows" a car to curb his drug habit.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman finds herself in jail after telling police she was frightened by a monkey mask. An intoxicate man feels an officer is very special. During a search, an officer finds contraband in a pack of cigarettes that has big consequences to an inmate. A young man says his mom tried to pepper spray him over his brother’s drug use while officers discover the truth to his arrest.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A media circus surrounds OJ Simpson as he is placed in jail for violating his bail agreement. During a body search, a man is tased and pepper-sprayed. A parole violation calls for all hands-on deck.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Over the course of a single shift, officers are forced to go toe to toe with a hotheaded inmate refusing to change cells without a fight and then must deal with the whims of a homeless man who demands room service and an upgraded jail cell.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A Batman impressionist is arrested after punching Chewbacca. A broken arm doesn’t stop a woman from struggling with officers. A man finds out it’s better to pay the fine then do the time. A woman involved in an affair with an older gentleman claims she was set up.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Toilet Paper Love Song
programme.desc: A man attempts to eat marijuana in jail. The Special Detention Unit investigates forbidden letters hidden amongst inmates. A bloody, vicious brawl escalates between an imprisoned duo.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman arrested 45 times gives advice to recently released drug users. Two Australian brothers can’t understand why playing a game of “footie” in a hotel hallway would land them in jail. A drunken nightclub security guard wrecks his scooter.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Uncooperative and agitated, a man complains officers are violating his rights. A “443” call is issued, and a deputy desperately needs help. Outside the cell block, there’s knockouts and bloody noses.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Prositutes discuss their risqu̩ occupation and explain their fees. An intoxicated woman doesn't want her blood drawn, and two shoplifters face the potential consequences of their actions.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate goes on a rampage when he suspects police of losing his money. Officers have a tough time with a drunk man. An alleged prostitute is stabbed. A drunk trapeze artist takes a drive on his moped.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate refuses to be handcuffed while officers seek to search his cell for contraband. A man tells deputies he is known as “Baby Boy” amongst the ladies. Fights erupt during prison phone time.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers outwit a man who refuses to give his name. A repeat DUI offender is jailed yet again. An intoxicated man is taken into custody and once the alcohol wears off he reveals that he’s broken his sobriety.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers conduct a strip search after an inmate is accused of carrying contraband. A repeat offender dances for deputies and fellow inmates. High on meth, a man acts erratically during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated man tests officers' patience. A woman tries to deceive police with multiple identities. A one-legged biker shows off his balancing skills to officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A couple is taken into custody for lewd and indecent exposure. An intoxicated woman believes that she is being treated unfairly, and a man with an existing wrap sheet is busted.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is placed in isolation after disparaging other inmates. Alarms blare while a fight erupts in the shower room among inmates. A man booked into jail is revealed to have a 20-year arrest record.

programme.title: Jail

programme.desc: Officers respond to a threatening man with a weapon. A man gives Officers a false name forgetting he’s wearing his name tag. A suspect in a stolen car collides with another vehicle then flees on foot.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E17 Two Mr. Fix Its
programme.desc: A suspect attempts to flee when officers tell him they will search him. Two men get in a fight over window installation. A hotel room is filled like a clown car with multiple suspects.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers discover a grand theft auto suspect hiding in his apartment. Officers assist the fire department in capturing a brown bear from a palm tree. Officers respond to a shooting.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police officers set up a sting operation using a taxi cab in to bust prostitution. A man claims he can’t remember his ‘girlfriend’s’ name when officers suspect the woman is actually a stranger. Female undercover officers set up a sting operation to bust johns.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers attempt to detain undocumented people crosssing the border. Border patrol discovers a driver with a load of drugs in his car. Officers check passports and a suspicious-looking laptop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers are forced to use a taser to subdue a drunk driver. A man is arrested for soliciting prostitution. Officers respond to a complex domestic disturbance call.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers in Boston bust a drug dealer in the midst of a transaction. Two adult men are questioned and later arrested for throwing bottles out of a moving vehicle. Officers set up a suspect who’s a known online predator in a sting operation.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Rather than stop, a driver decides to lead police on a high-speed chase. A woman is shot at by her ‘sugar daddy.’ A fleeing suspect dumps a suspicious liquid out of his window.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers are called when two intoxicated suspects decide to have some fun and vandalize a fence. Undercover officers set up a narcotics sting at a hotel. A man is found lying naked in a parking lot.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An ex-felon threatens to kill his spouse after she announces she want to divorce him. A driver is stopped with suspicious plants in her car. A woman crashes her friends truck into a pedestrian and a tree.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A transgender woman in a wheelchair opens a can of whoop ass on an aggressive bully. Officers find a barely dressed couple in the midst of a biting match. A reckless driver doesn’t take too kindly to being pulled over.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue a truck after a donut shop robbery. Deputies are dispatched when a wife attacks her husband with an unknown object. Deputies respond to a mother and son knife fight.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Hiding in an attic doesn’t work out so well for a man who comes crashing through a ceiling. Cops stop a man with a broken car and a broken heart. Neighbors call the police when non-stop cussin’ interrupts their night.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E20 Not My Text Messages
programme.desc: A routine traffic stop turns into a drug bust when cops turn up evidence of the driver's sizable habit. A suspicious man waiting in a parked car can't explain the incriminating texts on his phone. Two frequent flyers give officers a hard time when pulled over in a well-known drug area.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E24 Copy of Breaking Home Barriers
programme.desc: Officers respond after two men kick in a woman's door. Three suspects attempt to steal a bicycle in an alley. An officer arrests a husband for domestic abuse.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: The Organized Crime Unit places officers undercover as drug dealers on a street corner for a drug-reversal sting operation. An Officer responds to a domestic dispute call after a man's property is destroyed by his girlfriend's ill-tempered father. During a routine patrol, an Officer spots an intoxicated man assaulting a woman.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E08 You Had Me Fooled
programme.desc: An Officer goes undercover as a prostitute. A woman finds a snake in her home. A man solicits himself to an undercover officer.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E01 UC Drug Sting I
programme.desc: A man with a suspended license flees a routine traffic stop on foot. Deputies respond to a battered woman after receiving a 911 hang up call. A sting operation nets a suspected drug dealer.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A knife wielding man hangs around the lot of a convenience store. An intoxicated man in speedos flees from the police after urinating in a parking lot. An Officer responds to a domestic dispute after a man locks his girlfriend in the bathroom.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer assists a routine traffic stop which results in a DUI arrest. A drug related arrest is made in a high crime area. A man with a revoked driver’s license is placed under arrest and a prostitute is let go with a warning.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E34 Copy of Warning shot
programme.desc: Officers respond to an assault call at a local residence. A juvenile with a firearm is detained. Officers respond to a report of a man firing a gun in front of his residence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An investigation involving two suspicious men in parked cars results in a foot chase and drug bust. An officer responds to a domestic call involving a threatening exhusband who is taken into custody. Officers in Florida question a deceptive and drug using couple.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers hold a man under a car at gunpoint after a traffic stop. Officers are flagged down and directed to a couple arguing on the street. A man apologizes to detectives for the illicit items they find.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E13 I Take This Criminal
programme.desc: During an arrest, a suspect decides to pop the question to his girlfriend. An abandoned house becomes the target of burglary. Two brothers’ dispute over a business matter leads to violence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Several squad cars join together in pursuit of a pickup truck. Officers conduct a drug raid utilizing percussion grenades. A suspect wanted for numerous robberies flees from Police in a sports car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police respond to a report of prostitution in a hospital parking lot. A man and woman engaged in solicitation are pulled over. A woman loitering in an area known for prostitution tries to evade police.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A high-speed chase ends when the suspect plays chicken with a concrete pole. An emotional man just wants the cops to give him a little kiss. A melee breaks out when a woman seizes her beau's cell phone.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond after a bloody man is seen prowling around an apartment complex. Officers pull over a suspicious vehicle. Police seize drugs and a large knife from a bicyclist.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers attempt to pull over a suspect reported having been involved in a car jacking. A suspect is caught in the act of burying a bag with illegal prescription drugs.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E16 Mean Girls Times Two
programme.desc: Deputies are forced to tase a man after pursuing him into a field. A driver plays dumb when asked about the revolver under his car seat. Officers respond to two teenage girls in a fight.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E30 Follow the Tire Tracks
programme.desc: A decoy vehicle is strategically abandoned in a public parking lot. An officer responds to a burglary in progress at a tire store. Officers respond to a domestic call at a nearby trailer park.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect in a traffic stop decides to handle the situation by screaming at the police. Officers have a close encounter with a suspect who admits that he has hidden contraband. A man’s clothing choices tip police off to possible criminal behavior.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man runs from police claiming he heard a gunshot. A woman lays the blame on her boyfriend. Officers confront a man who refuses to come down from a roof.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A normal traffic stop turns into an off-road race through a residential neighborhood. Police find a runaway suspect taking refuge in a family member’s closet. A domestic dispute erupts over chips and dip.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers give chase to a suspect on a bike. The passenger of a vehicle is arrested for possession. Police are given a classic "I'm holding it for a friend" excuse.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect tries to elude officers by driving on a rough road. An argument over a cigarette turns ugly. Kids throw rocks from an overpass at the wrong car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police arrest a bicycling dealer and his client. Police respond to a call of an unhinged rottweiler. Officers arrest an inebriated man after they spot him grabbing a female bystander.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies question a woman they believe to be a prostitute working the Las Vegas Strip. A woman tries to pin ownership of drug paraphernalia on an absent friend. A man consents to let officers in his backyard, but he confesses to his own trespasses first.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E26 Pitted Against Each Other
programme.desc: A chase ends after one of the police units disables the vehicle. An officer responds to a domestic dispute between a mother and her son. Officers attempt to pull over a vehicle with expired tags.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer pulls over an erratic driver while on the way to a shots fired call. An officer attempts to stop a resistant motorcyclist. Officers respond to a domestic violence call involving an intoxicated man and a woman with warrants.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A couple out for some fun get into trouble when they can’t wait to get home. The deputies of Alameda County set up a prostitution sting in a local hotel. Two women walking down Las Vegas Boulevard are stopped with suspicious drinks.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E08 Step Away From the Cutlery
programme.desc: Cops attempt to piece together whether or not an erratic driver is in a stolen vehicle. A knife-wielding man complains that rude neighbors won’t stop smoking pot. Officers come upon an emotional man with a blade to his throat.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue a vehicle that struck a police car. Two men deny the lawnmower in their truck is stolen. Deputies are called when a mother attempts to run her daughter over.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers assist an off-duty deputy being followed by a vehicle trying to force him off of the road. An officer responds to a domestic disturbance call involving a woman and her cheating husband.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police respond to an emergency call and find a man in dire trouble. Deputies respond to an abusive husband at a local eatery. Two women try to buy narcotics from an undercover deputy during a sting.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Detectives find a loaded gun while searching a vehicle. Local residents complain about a loud neighbor. A man is spotted walking down a road with a saw.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies prevent the delivery of a pillow stuffed with drugs. A disabled woman calls the law when a father and son get into a fist fight. Deputies confront an intoxicated man riding a bike.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A carjacking results in a chase and a flipped vehicle. Suspects crash a truck after attempting to steal beer. A man attempts to swallow his drugs during a bust.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E11 This Man Stabbed Me
programme.desc: A car thief leads police on a high-speed chase until officers pit his vehicle to end the pursuit. Cops cool off a baby and search for the man who left him in a car. Potty-mouthed witnesses inform officers that their friend has been stabbed in the chest.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man tosses his stash after being pulled over. Officers question two men in a fight who live with the same woman. A man says his shorts are from a thrift store after drugs are found in them.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Suspects lead Officers on a reckless car chase on residential streets. Police tend to a woman assaulted by her inebriated friend. A DWI suspect is found relieving himself in a public port-a-potty.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue an SUV on the freeway. Deputies are called after an agitated man arms himself with scissors. A driver tells officers the illegal items found in his car was left by a friend.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police investigate a possible abduction at a trailer park. A man in a stolen truck is pulled over and Officers discover washed checks and drug paraphernalia. A suspect is arrested after abandoning a stolen vehicle behind a fast food restaurant.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man throws out his narcotics during a foot-chase with police. A woman is arrested for possession of drug paraphernalia. Officers call for back-up after a woman is held at knife-point.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police conduct a sting operation. A woman is covered in white powder during a traffic stop. Officers spot a young boy on a bike who wandered away from home.

programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford unveils four spellbinding dishes! First up, arctic char ceviche! Next, duck-lychee fried rice! Followed by vegan king oyster tacos! Finishing with kimchi hot pot!

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Papaya Salad, Carrot Hog Dogs, Squid, and Tofu
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford unveils four spellbinding dishes! First up, green papaya salad with crispy pork! Next, BBQ carrot hot dogs! Followed by grilled squid steak! Finishing with Korean BBQ tofu!

programme.title: Maddie and Kiki's BBQ Barn
programme.desc: Fun-loving sisters and expert grillmasters Maddie and Kiki welcome you into their country barn for craveable eats and spicy jokes! On this episode, they smoke salmon to turn it into pastrami, whip up a colorful Caribbean salad, and grill savory rosemary-seasoned pork chops!

programme.title: Maddie and Kiki's BBQ Barn
programme.desc: Fun-loving sisters and expert grillmasters Maddie and Kiki welcome you into their country barn for craveable eats and spicy jokes! On this episode, they smoke a gorgeous lamb shoulder, whip up a simple grated salad, and grill up Jamaican jerk mushrooms!

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Clam, Risotto, Potatoes, and Salmon

programme.title: Cheeseburgers of the World

programme.title: Corktales

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever

programme.title: Cook the Books

programme.title: The Urban Vegetarian
programme.desc: Desiree Nielsen shows us how to add more plants to your plate with a chocolate avocado smoothie, nori rolls, and sweet potato noodles.

programme.title: The Urban Vegetarian
programme.desc: Host Desiree Nielsen spiralizes zucchini into zoodles to create a balanced, veggie-packed pad thai dish.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Puglia's lush landscape and large coastline characterize its cuisine. Chef Michael Bonacini explores its native ingredients through some of Puglia's favourite meals. First up, Michael's antipasto is a guaranteed crunchy bite with crispy Fried Mussels. Stepping away from the sea, Michael highlights Puglia's prize crop: tomatoes! Combining colourful tomatoes with flavourful burrata cheese, Michael cooks up comfort in a bowl with his Tomato and Burrata Risotto. Taking on a more festive flair, Michael introduces us to Little Pork Bombs, the hottest street food in Puglia. With a filling of fresh herbs and melted cheese, these pork skewers are savoury and irresistible. Then, Michael introduces...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Simplicity is key with Sicilian cuisine and Chef Michael Bonacini explores just how the region balances simplicity with intensity through four flavourful dishes. Starting with an antipasto of Folded Flatbread with Ricotta and Fennel Seeds, Michael inspires with its intricate beauty with a simple recipe. Keeping to the theme of simplicity, Michael shows that plenty of flavour can come from little ingredients in his primo of Broccoli and Sausage Rigatoni. The spicy sausage and chili is countered by a creamy broccoli pesto for a dish that highlights Sicilian cuisine. Michael turns to the Italian queen of crops for his secondo: Eggplant Parmesan Roll-Ups. With thin slices of eggplant rolled...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Filled with ruins in its bustling streets, the region of Lazio sticks with grandeur in all it does, including food! To introduce us to Lazio, Host Michael Bonacini highlights its Jewish influence with a crispy Roman Jewish-style Artichokes. As crunchy as a potato chip, Michael's artichokes are a delicious fried treat that are a perfect way to kick off a delicious meal. For his primo Michael brings together simple ingredients to create a rich Bucatini with Amatriciana Sauce. Michael's secondo turns what was once peasant food into a delectable and tender dish. Cooked with a blend of vegetables and sauce, Michael's Braised Oxtail brings forth the history of cuisine. Returning to Rome for his...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Campania's beautiful coastline is filled with two things: tourists and seafood. Diving into the culture of the region, Celebrity Chef Michael Bonacini begins his meal with a salad from the Island of Capri. Putting a twist on the classic dish, Michael's Grilled Caprese Salad combines fresh tomatoes, tangy balsamic, and a hint of sweetness from basil. For his primo, Michael serves up bold flavours with his Spaghetti Puttanesca. Mixing salty and sweet, this sauce offers a delicious take on the typical plate of spaghetti. Looking to the coast for his secondo, Michael quickly cooks up aromatic and spicy Herb-stuffed Scallops and Grilled Broccoli Rabe. For his dolce Michael whips up a dessert...

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Clam, Risotto, Potatoes, and Salmon
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford unveils four spellbinding dishes! First up, clams and artichoke! Next, radicchio risotto. Followed by an Arabic twist on baked potatoes! Finishing with a BC roasted salmon!

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Pancakes, Lobster Soup, Duck, and Flan
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford unveils four spellbinding dishes! First up, wild rice pancakes! Next, lobster-lime soup! Followed by a Tuscan porchetta-style duck! Finishing with a flan with port-soaked cherries!

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Tart, Tuna, Carbonara, and Claufoutis
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford unveils four spellbinding dishes! First up, a mushroom-brie tart! Next, tuna with grilled fennel-kale! Followed by classic spaghetti Carbonara! Finishing with a berry clafoutis!

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Cucumber Salad, Chicken, Noodles and Fritters
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford unveils four spellbinding dishes! First up, Thai cucumber salad! Next, pomegranate-glazed chicken! Followed by cheesy sweet potato noodles! Finishing with honey-cheese fritters!

programme.title: Cook the Books
programme.desc: Chef-host Shahir Massoud tries out recipes from another award-winning cookbook: Pasta Every Day by Meryl Feinstein! Follow along as Shahir demonstrates how to make a variety of pasta shapes, like cavatelli, farfalle, and gnocchi, complete with delicious sauces!

programme.title: Cheeseburgers of the World
programme.desc: Chef Joe Friday cooks up a Maine Lobster Burger from the USA, Rice Burger from Japan, and Chimichurri Burger from the Dominican Republic.

programme.title: Corktales
programme.desc: Pull up a stool and join master mixologist Yvonne Langen as she shows us how to prepare The Last Word, a gin fizz, a Moscow mule, and more on Corktales!

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Puglia's lush landscape and large coastline characterize its cuisine. Chef Michael Bonacini explores its native ingredients through some of Puglia's favourite meals. First up, Michael's antipasto is a guaranteed crunchy bite with crispy Fried Mussels. Stepping away from the sea, Michael highlights Puglia's prize crop: tomatoes! Combining colourful tomatoes with flavourful burrata cheese, Michael cooks up comfort in a bowl with his Tomato and Burrata Risotto. Taking on a more festive flair, Michael introduces us to Little Pork Bombs, the hottest street food in Puglia. With a filling of fresh herbs and melted cheese, these pork skewers are savoury and irresistible. Then, Michael introduces...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Simplicity is key with Sicilian cuisine and Chef Michael Bonacini explores just how the region balances simplicity with intensity through four flavourful dishes. Starting with an antipasto of Folded Flatbread with Ricotta and Fennel Seeds, Michael inspires with its intricate beauty with a simple recipe. Keeping to the theme of simplicity, Michael shows that plenty of flavour can come from little ingredients in his primo of Broccoli and Sausage Rigatoni. The spicy sausage and chili is countered by a creamy broccoli pesto for a dish that highlights Sicilian cuisine. Michael turns to the Italian queen of crops for his secondo: Eggplant Parmesan Roll-Ups. With thin slices of eggplant rolled...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Pork was Made for Barbeques
programme.desc: Pork and the grill are good buddies and host Spencer Watts shows us four of his favourite pork recipes that will have you salivating.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Fun and quirky host Chef Spencer Watts kicks off this episode by showing off his knife skills as he sabres a pineapple to start his instant classic; Grilled Fruit Salad. The pineapple joins a mix of bright summer fruits on the grill, then berries, spicy citrus vinaigrette and savoury feta cheese. Next up, Spencer whips up his Hawaiian Chicken recipe. Spiced with cayenne and Chinese five spice, Spencer stuffs flavourful chicken thighs with pineapple and grills it with a delightful ginger and soy sauce. Every bite is sweet, savoury, and fresh - exactly how summer should taste! Then Spencer shares his top tips for adding smoky flavours to pork using an easy and handy smoke pouch. His Apple...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Allium in the Family
programme.desc: Onions, green onions, chives, garlic, and leeks are all members of the same fabulous flowering family, Allium! First up? Chef Watts shows us his sweet and smoky Charred Leeks with Romesco; add grilled toast and you have your next party appetizer! Next up is a main course. Spencer starts with a juicy grilled pork chop, then adds roasted garlic melted into a balsamic onion chutney to make his out-of-this-world Roasted Garlic Pork Chops. Looking for a crowd pleaser that's easy to make? Spencer has a recipe for that! Chicken Yakitori. He threads skewers with crunchy green onions and tender chicken and caramelizes the yakitori sauce as he grills this tasty dish. Are you ready to drool? Spencer...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Have a cheese lover coming over? Blow their minds with some of Spencer's "grate" barbecued cheese recipes! First up, Spencer chars Brie Cheese to an ooey-gooey perfection and tops it with tart cherries and crunchy walnuts, serving it with crispy grilled crostinis. Next up is a Grilled Steak and Caesar with a twist only Spencer could add - grilled... lettuce! Then, Spencer uses the classic German "hasselback" presentation to stuff chicken breasts with verdant spinach, yummy Swiss cheese and pungent sun- dried tomatoes, grilling them to melty perfection. Finally, Spencer fires up his barbecue to make his Grilled Peaches with Salted Bourbon Caramel, a decadent dessert elevated with creamy...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: In this bacon loving episode, Chef Spencer delivers a tasty Bacon Weave Turkey Breast, which gets injected with beer and spices before being wrapped up in its cozy bacon blanket and sent off to the grill! Next up? A Peameal Bacon Roast with Rosti. This heavy hunk of back bacon gets smoked to flavourful perfection while Chef Watts makes the crispiest golden-fried-to-perfection potato pancake. Then, Spencer whips up a charry, grilled, super decadent, bacon-wrapped and bacon stuffed cheeseburger. Spencer isn't finished with bacon yet! For his final recipe, Spencer stuffs an apple with decadent crispy morsels stuffed along with savoury caramelized onions and melty cheddar cheese.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: This episode kicks off with Spencer's tasty Grilled Caesar Salad. He skillfully piles of char-grilled romaine lettuce wedges and sourdough croutons are topped with tangy dressing, crispy pancetta, and shards of a homemade parmesan tuile. For his next recipe, Spencer whips up Grilled Zucchini Boats that filled with fresh ingredients including orzo pasta, summer veggies, and herbs. Chef Watts loves a good steak and his Grilled Cauliflower Steak is not one to be passed up! Dusted in Middle Eastern Spices, flame roasted and served with chili-spiked, Yemeni 'Skhug' hot sauce and pomegranate seeds. Finally, Spencer steams tender artichokes, stuffing these flowers with breadcrumbs and...

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Welcome to BBQing 101. The team gives the school term a kick start for some rowdy university students. Smoked Pulled Pork with Tangy BBQ Sauce, Spiced up Beer Can Chicken and Chili Yam Fries give these scholars a taste of simple, healthy BBQed food.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the team do some extreme grilling for the skateboarders at a local park. The crowd flips for Black Bean Mussels, Prosciutto Wrapped Chicken Breasts Stuffed with Goat Cheese, Smoked Tomato Bruschetta and Smoked Banana Sticks with Rum Butter Glaze.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and his team visit the tennis club and serve up some grilled eats for the club members. Smoked Salmon, Beef Tenderloin with Cherry Sauce, Asparagus with Citrus Butter with a Grand Slam Beet Salad are the perfect match after a long day on the courts

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Team prepare BBQ Sunday Dinner with ingredients from the Farmers Market. Herbed Prime Rib, Grilled Pork Chops with Garlic and Herbs, Roasted Root Veggies with Mustard Glaze, and Yorkshire pudding will please friends and family alike!

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Using internationally inspired recipes, Matt and the Road Grill team take us on a taste bud tour around the world with Stuffed Peppers, Bison Burgers with Oka Cheese, Tandoori Lamb Ribs and Tea Smoked Hoisin Duck.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 The Coed Charity Baseball Tournament
programme.desc: Matt and the Team cook up a mound of food for hungry athletes raising money for charity. No one went hungry with Beef Dip Sandwiches; Lemon Honey Garlic Baby Back Pork Ribs; and fresh Grilled Mahi-mahi with sweet Pineapple Tomatillo Salsa.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob is having a Costume Party he's bravely entrusted his buddy Jim to pick out their outfits. With a menu of slow smoked Thai ribs, cinnamon chicken and snapper in parchment paper, Rob's skill at the grill is unmasked

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: It's time for Rob's long awaited pool party. His friends sun by the pool, while Rob makes a splash at the grill with turkey burgers, slow smoked beef ribs, roasted tomato salad and grilled chicken with spicy pine nut crust.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Hold your Horse"...shoes! Rob hosts his annual Horseshoe BBQ tournament, and grills up a southern feast. He and his ring of friends devour delicious smoked rotisserie pig, lemon ginger chicken drumsticks and roasted peppers stuffed with corn.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob is born to be wild - Hog Wild that is! Rob and his motorcycle riding friends cruise the streets for charity then head back to Rob's for the post parade party. The hungry bikers don't rebel when he serves up a picnic pork roast, funky potato packages, tamarind shrimp, plus sauces and sides galore.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: On your mark, get set, grill! Rob hosts an Olympic celebration and serves up a gold medal meal of stuffed veal chops, smoked leg of lamb, grilled pesto peppers and a cool summer salad.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob and his friends catch a wave of good times and good food at his Surf & Turf BBQ. They feast of crab legs, roasted leg of lamb, a bucket of clams and the biggest thickest steak you ever did see!

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Grilling expert Spencer Watts hosts a tasty beef-a-palooza with four incredible beef cuts including smoked brisket and succulent beef tenderloin.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Barbeque isn’t Just for Meat
programme.desc: Barbeque is not just about meat! Chef Spencer Watts shows us how to grill fruits and vegetables like a pro.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Grilled, Roasted & Charred Chicken
programme.desc: Charismatic host Spencer Watts shows us why chicken is best on the grill with four irresistible chicken recipes.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: There are limitless options with lamb on the grill! Host Spencer Watts offers some tips and tricks on how to prepare four different cuts of lamb.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Whether for a small family dinner or a big backyard barbeque, host Spencer Watts shows us the best ways to grill up tasty duck, turkey, capon, and quail.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Sides & Sweets with Heat
programme.desc: Never underestimate the power of a good side or dessert! Fun host Spencer Watts grills up the perfect sides and treats for your next barbeque.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Team to cook up a midsummer feast. Leg of Lamb with Summer Herbs, Rosemary Grilled Pork Tenderloin with Wild Berry Sauce, Grilled Trout with Peaches, and a Tomato Salad have the locals raiding the market to stay stocked on the season's best.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Road Grill Team spend the day playing around the Water Park. The Spit Roasted Lemon-Lime Butter Chicken, Grilled Swordfish Skewers with Caribbean Salsa, and Smokey Spareribs with BBQ Sauce result in a big splash with this pool loving crowd.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Road Grill team grill up a feast for some hungry athletes at the Ultimate Frisbee Tournament. Jumbo shrimp with a rosemary dry rub, Slo-smoked Pork Butt in a Papaya Marinade, and Asian Pasta Salad have the athletes asking for more.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: The Antique Steam train is in town! Matt and the team give the crowd something to chew-chew on with delicious Grilled Vegetable Quesadillas, Honey Mustard Chicken Drumsticks, Grilled Turkey Burgers with Pineapple Salsa, and Grilled Corn with Orange Butter

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: The Road Grill team follows him to the baseball diamond and together they treat the ball players to two kinds of mini burgers, some triple play stuffed veal, Mushroom Fricassee on a baguette, and Homerun Mixed Smoked Nuts.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Road Grill team lend a hand at a Habitat for Humanity building site to feed hungry volunteers. Matt and the team make some delicious Brick Chicken, some Maple Wood Planked Pork, Steak Sandwiches, and Blue Cheese and Bacon Potato Salad.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Going once, going twice, gone. Rob and his friends are donating their special keepsakes to a Silent Auction to raise money for charity. They head over to Robs for a quick and delicious pre-auction chowdown that includes lemon pepper Cornish Hens, sweet monkfish, chili lime shrimp and stuffed pork tenderloin.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob likes to Rock and Roll all night and BBQ every Saturday. This time he rocks out with his buddy Jim's Band "Giver". While they belt out the tunes, Rob creates his own hits with grilled lamb chops, crispy potato skins, beef brisket and smoked Proscuitto wrapped shrimp.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Ole! Rob serves up a Spanish Tapas BBQ that includes spicy lamb ribs, beef tenderloin, blackened scallops, proscuitto wrapped figs stuffed with blue cheese and gazpacho vodka in cucumber cups. The portions are small, but the taste is huge! And that's no bull.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob likes clowning around, but he is the Ringmaster of his own Carnival Day BBQ. After a fun day at the fair, Rob keeps the party going with a fairground finger food like pizza burgers, homemade pogos, pork ribs and cool iced tea.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob and his friends are hitting the bike trails. After a long bike ride, Rob grills up a high protein meal of veal ribs, steelhead trout, southwestern black bean salad and pistachio and honey crusted lamb racks.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: The liquor cabinet is getting too full so Rob is throwing a Boozy BBQ with the left over spirits from parties past. He pulls together a feast of tequila chicken breasts, white wine veal chops, martini and grilled tarragon mushrooms.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Pork was Made for Barbeques
programme.desc: Pork and the grill are good buddies and host Spencer Watts shows us four of his favourite pork recipes that will have you salivating.

programme.desc: Matt and his team visit the tennis club and serve up some grilled eats for the club members. Smoked Salmon, Beef Tenderloin with Cherry Sauce, Asparagus with Citrus Butter with a Grand Slam Beet Salad are the perfect match after a long day on the courts

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Team prepare BBQ Sunday Dinner with ingredients from the Farmers Market. Herbed Prime Rib, Grilled Pork Chops with Garlic and Herbs, Roasted Root Veggies with Mustard Glaze, and Yorkshire pudding will please friends and family alike!

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Using internationally inspired recipes, Matt and the Road Grill team take us on a taste bud tour around the world with Stuffed Peppers, Bison Burgers with Oka Cheese, Tandoori Lamb Ribs and Tea Smoked Hoisin Duck.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 The Coed Charity Baseball Tournament
programme.desc: Matt and the Team cook up a mound of food for hungry athletes raising money for charity. No one went hungry with Beef Dip Sandwiches; Lemon Honey Garlic Baby Back Pork Ribs; and fresh Grilled Mahi-mahi with sweet Pineapple Tomatillo Salsa.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob and his buddies are game for something wild. Rob obliges with a 5-star menu that includes smoked quail, grilled venison chops, stacked sweet potatoes and grilled brussel sprouts.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob's backyard is going to the dogs thanks to his new canine friend, Freddy. He and his dog loving friends enjoy a grilled breakfast before the daily walk to the dog park. French toast, bacon, sausage potato hash browns and baked eggs in hams crisps have everyone panting and taking home doggie bags.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob's friend Rick just got his big job promotion and it time to cel-ah -brate! The food is executive class all the way, with grilled raspberry Cornish hens, roasted beefeater tomatoes, spicy ground beef skewers, eggplant & squash salad and grilled nectarines over ice cream.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: It's Saturday and Rob invites some friends over for a swim, some laughs and some great food grilled on his new charcoal BBQ. Rob goes all out preparing pizza, nachos, grilled shrimp quesadillas and buffalo burgers. Why? Just because! You never really need a reason to fire up some good times.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: It is a three alarm feast when Rob throws a BBQ party for the local volunteer firefighters. His guests like it hot and Rob spices things up with big juicy steaks, grilled peppers, smoked ribs, plus hot and hotter and the hottest bbq sauces.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob is having the Ultimate BBQ with his fellow Ultimate Frisbee players. His hammer throw may need some work, but Rob grilled spread of seafood kabobs, baked potatoes, grilled vegetable and tortellini salad and roasted leg of lamb are champions.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: The most liked post on any grill-master's social feed is 'meat on a stick' - and Chef Spencer's Turkish-style chicken kabob is worth every click! He marinates thick juicy chicken morsels in yogurt and spices, and then grills these flavourful skewers to a charry perfection. Next up is the creative 'Tornado Potato' which re- invents grilled potatoes with a wild presentation and a trio of toppings. Spencer then assembles Char Siu Sliders on tiny party- ready buns. Stuffed with a soy, honey and umami-packed hoisin lacquered slow-and-low grilled pork belly, these tasty little sliders will have your taste buds tingling. For his final recipe, Spencer whips up toasted crispy roti cups; topping...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Chef Spencer starts this spicy barbeque episode with flavours from Thailand with a Bok Choy with a Ginger Chili Sauce. Powerful bird's eye chilies are packed into a sweet and spicy sauce and served over tasty grilled bok choy. Spencer then introduces us to Calabrian chilies, mashed into a spice paste and rubbed on butterflied chicken that then gets grilled to flame-kissed perfection. Next, Spencer gives fresh calamari some heat with Korean chilies that add their distinctive heat and flavour before grilling this scrumptious recipe and serving it over a comforting bed of rice and peas. Finally, Spencer prepares Seekh Kabobs, made with ground lamb spiked with punchy dried Kashmiri chilies...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: First stop on Chef Spencer's Spanish flavour tour? Habanero Char-Grilled Octopus - warmed up with punchy chilies and balanced with a sweet and tangy sherry vinaigrette. Next, Spencer stuffs whole sea bass with citrus and herbs, gives it the grill treatment and then tops it with olive oil blistered cherry tomatoes. The rotisserie does the heavy lifting for Mr. Watts' whole roast chicken - spiked with bright Spanish flavours like Spanish chilies and smoked paprika, slow cooked and served extra juicy. Finally, Spencer prepares a classic Spanish recipe: Paella. Loaded saffron rice, piled high with chorizo, veggies, and shellfish. Of course, Spencer's Paella is made in the Spanish tradition;...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 The Butter Did It
programme.desc: It's all about beautiful butter in this episode of Watts on the Grill! First up, entertaining host Spencer fires tosses clams in velvety butter, zesty garlic and earthy spices to make his Clams with Garlic Paprika Butter. Next up is a traditional Indian recipe, but done on the grill - Butter Chicken! All the butter chicken flavours we love are infused in the marinade, before getting crisped up on the fiery grill - the result is both classic and completely new! Scallops are next, grilled and served with a mouth-watering caper-raisin butter. For his final recipe; Chef Watts prepares a rich and juicy grilled Rib Steak topped with a decadent port wine compound butter. Oh, what a butter-loving...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: We've all cooked with salt. But what about ON salt. That's right, chef Spencer Watts blows our minds with his seared scallops that are cooked on a Himalayan pink salt block. His next recipe uses a quick cure with Hawaiian black lava salt on swordfish steaks, then tops them with a gorgeous and refreshing grilled fruit salsa. Then, Spencer gets creative with Cured Duck Legs with Scallions, using a salt cure to intensify the flavours of duck leg before it's cooked slow and low, then glazed with maple and soy. After cooking on salt, curing with salt, the only thing left is to cook INSIDE salt - Spencer's Salt Crusted Prime Rib is a game changer, flavourful, bone-in beef that he seasons with a...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Chocolate on the barbecue? That's right. Chef Spencer Watts kicks off this episode as he grills a crispy coconut-cacao crust and serves it with sweet chili dipping sauce. Chocolate is the not-so-secret ingredient in Spencer's Grilled Chicken Molé. He grills the chicken legs smothered in the sweet-spicy-salty-nutty-creamy-chocolatey sauce, then finishes it by cooking it slow and low. Next, dark chocolate cocoa powder is in both the rub and the sauce for Chef Watts' favourite pork rib recipe - Cocoa-rubbed Baby Back Ribs. For his final recipe, Spencer takes it to a sweet level with his Chocolate pizza made with chocolate ganache, grilled cherries, with barbeque- caramelized white chocolate...

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Everyone should treat Mom to a special breakfast! Matt and his team treated a crowd on Mother's Day to a BBQed Brunch. They feasted on Stuffed Blueberry Mascarpone French Toast, a Veggie Frittata, Applewood Smoked Canadian Bacon, and Fresh Fruit Smoothies

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: The Buskers Festival is in town! The team hit the grill to do some BBQ entertaining. They cook up a feast for the crowd including a Roast of Pork with Concord Grape Sauce, Spicy Shrimp, and Beer Braised Sausage with Caramelized Onions

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: The Road Grill Team go to a neighbourhood Garage Sale, then treat everyone to everyday dishes with a twist. Matt and his team grill up some Grilled Porterhouse Steaks in a Homemade Steak Spice; Grilled Lemon Prosciutto Scallops; Planked Stuffed Potatoes and a Grilled Caesar Salad.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt loves animals - including dogs. He goes to a Dog Show to give dog lovers a little taste of what the QB is cooking - Garlicky Grilled Artichokes; Bacon Wrapped Halibut With Lime Scallion Sauce Sauce; Slow Cooked Spareribs With Guava Glaze; and A Summer Wild Berry Crisp.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Team grill up some chow at a bike ride Fundraiser. They tempt the crowd with Hazelnut Crusted Halibut with Strawberry Salsa, Pork Picnic Roast with Blackberry Chipotle Glaze, Grilled Paninis with Roast Veggies, and Spinach Salad with Apples, Bacon and Cashews

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and his team hit fitness central and cook up a grilled feast that is high on protein and lean on fat including Salt Crusted Peel and Eat Shrimp; Lime Chipotle Pork Medallions; Mesquite Smoked Turkey with Peach Glaze and a Sweet and Spicy Black Bean Salad.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: In celebration of past boys trips to Mexico, the gang gathers to reminisce and relive their rowdy ways. Smoked Turkey enchiladas, Mexican chicken, steak tacos, and sangria dress the table while the boys fiesta the night away.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S04 : E20 World Cup Pub Fare Party
programme.desc: It's Euro- Cup soccer time, and Rob is hosting a World Cup Pub Fare Party. Before the game begins his pals are going to chow down on some beer marinated beef dip, chicken wings, turkey drummettes and fish & chips.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Why order in Chinese Food when you can grill it up yourself? Rob creates his own version of Chinese Food, on the Barbeque - Chinese style ribs, 5 spice beef skewers, chicken in black bean sauce, scallops with bok choy and noodle salad.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Vegetarians walk amongst us, and Rob gets challenged by his veggie loving friend to grill up a meatless BBQ. Rob steps up to the grill and demonstrates that he can grill it all! Bbqed stuffed cabbage rolls, roasted veggie cal zone, maple butter spiced squash and spinach cherry salad.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob's Tennis Tournament BBQ is a smash with lamb shanks, roasted garlic mashed potatoes and black bean mussels. His guests all agree when it comes to barbequing Rob has the best serve.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob rewards the community kids for their hard work on the new park skateboard ramp. He "Kick Flips" the grill with some maple mustard pork burgers, chicken smoked pizza and corn on the cob with chili butter.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 A Barbeque Classic: Ribs
programme.desc: Grill master Spencer Watts shows us four ways to barbeque a classic. Succulent, tender, mouth-watering ribs.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Barbecuing bananas, that's crazy. Chef Spencer Watts shows us how to grill the delicate, evERS-scrumptious fruit. Bananas.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Fish on the Grill
programme.desc: Fish. Flaky, flavoursome, and perfect for barbeque. High energy host Spencer Watts tests out his grill with delightfully tender fish dishes.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Shellfish is delicate, tantalizing, and full of flavour, especially when it's grilled to perfection

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Barbeque is all about sauces, rubs and marinades

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Salsa that will Dance on Your Tongue
programme.desc: Salsa means undeniable flavour! Lively host Spencer Watts plays with sweet, salty, and spicy in four amazing salsa recipes.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Not only do the racers in the Soap Box Derby have a need for speed, they have a need for BBQ! Matt and the RG team cook up a feast to slow down any speedster. The menu: Smoked Shrimp B.L.T., Pineapple Basil Rotisserie Chicken, Grilled Sweet Potato Pops, and Summer Berry Pudding.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Day By the Water
programme.desc: Matt spends the day by the water; fishing, playing Frisbee, catching some rays. What goes with water and sun? BBQ!!! Matt & his team make a seafood buffet of Grilled Clams in the Shell with Serrano Ham, Smoked Lake Rainbow Trout, Grilled Lobster with Grapefruit Salsa, and Crab-Stuffed Avocados.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt gets down and dirty playing some beach Volleyball. In between bumps, sets, and spikes, the RG team serves up a smorgasbord of great food. The menu: Grilled Chicken Breast on Foccacia with Grilled Apples & Cambozola Cheese, Sezchuan Ribs with Chunky Plum Dipping Sauce, Roasted Corn and Pepper Potato Salad, and Homemade Protein Bars

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Forget bicycle built for two. This Big Bike fits 30 people! Matt & the team join forces with the Heart & Stroke foundation to raise money by riding around a track. Matt feeds these 'bikers' some healthy and delicious grub. The menu: Grilled Calamari, Smoked Turkey Fajitas, Grilled Scallops and Watermelon Salsa, and Cold Gazpacho.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: It's a bird, it's a plane, it's a day of great BBQ. Inspired by the aerial acrobatics of CF18's and Harvards, Matt cooks up a variety of poultry and fowl. The menu: Bacon Wrapped Quail Stuffed with 3 Cream Cheeses, Raspberry Chipotle Turkey Wings, Grilled Balsamic Marinated Duck Breast, and Deviled Eggs.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Whether you're a pro or a beginner, everyone is welcome to join the Road Grill team at the 19th tee where Matt is busy burnin' up his Q's. What better way to end your day at the links with an enticing menu of Miso Citrus Grilled Sablefish, Smoked Rack of Pork with a Sour Cherry Sauce , Lemon Basil Smashed Potatoes with Mushrooms, Arugula Salad with Peaches, and Blue Cheese and Walnuts.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: It's all Greek at Robby's when he grills up smoked dill and shallot trout, leg of lamb, port marinated fig, stuffed peppers and lemon anchovy flavoured potatoes.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob feeds a full house of his poker buddies with smoked beef ribs, brisket, smoked trout, potato skins, grilled shrimp and a curried slaw. It's a sure bet the boys left with a full stomach!

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob and the boys train for the big 3 on 3 b-ball tournament and feast on grilled tandoori chicken, salmon cakes, pork satay, grilled potato chips and a roasted red pepper salad.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 Just Another Pool Party
programme.desc: The sun is shining, the pool is full and the food is hot. While his friends frolic poolside, Rob grills up some rum and mint grilled chicken wings, grilled seafood Paella, two kinds of smoked pork and some smoked salmon and crab rolls.

programme.title: Simplicity vs. Splendor on the Seaside
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Soaking in the beauty and elegance of the French Riviera, Marko and Alex are in Nice to enjoy the simplicity and splendor of this seaside city.

programme.title: Keep Austin Weird
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In the state capital of Texas, Marko and Alex see what Austin has to offer. An eclectic city known for its music and cuisine, the guys brave the Texas heat and check out what keeps Austin weird.

programme.title: Levels of Luxury in Laos
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Sandwiched between Thailand, Vietnam, and Cambodia, Laos is a destination often overlooked by tourists. Marko and Alex are uncovering the hidden gem of Vientiane, the capital city, to see what goes on in this sleepy town beside the Mekong River.

programme.title: The Gainful Grace of Geneva
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Marko and Alex find themselves in the prosperous and pristine city of Geneva, Switzerland. A city nestled alongside a beautiful glacier-fed lake, the guys will explore the riches Geneva has to offer.

programme.title: The Thriving Traditions of Taipei
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Welcome to the buzzing capital of Taiwan. A rich blend of cultures, old meets new in this thriving metropolis of Taipei. Marko and Alex eat their way through the city, experiencing some unique traditions along the way.

programme.title: The Lion's Share of Lyon
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Marko and Alex head to Lyon, France, a city known for its gastronomy and endless history.

programme.title: Oceanside in Okinawa
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Ocean breeze, turquoise waters and a whole lot of amazing cuisine. Marko and Alex are soaking up that island life in Okinawa, Japan and learning what makes it so unique.

programme.title: Genoa From Above and Below
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In Genoa, the brothers cruise the streets, while one of them gets a taste for the lavish lifestyle of Italy's Northwestern port. They take in all the views: heads in the clouds on a high-flying funicular, and just above water at the local aquarium.

programme.title: The L.A. Lifestyle
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Green juice, avocado toast, and surfers galore. Marko and Alex are back home in Los Angeles to explore their town, staycation style. From downtown to the beach, the guys do everything fun under the sun in the city of angels.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico S2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Viajar Mexico S2 Monterrey
programme.desc: In Monterrey, one of Mexico’s ‘Pueblo Magicos’, Charlie heads straight to a canyon, where the locals go to have ‘beer and barbecue’ picnics.

programme.title: Kissed By The Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Kissed By The Sea Mauritius 2
programme.desc: While exploring island life in Mauritius, Sakshi Pradhan tries out the third longest zipline in the world and sees the unique phenomenon of the 23 coloured Earth at Vallée des Couleurs. Following this, she takes a submarine ride and explores the passion of the locals for horse races. She also encounters tortoises and crocodiles at the Vanilla Crocodile Park.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 World Heritage Monuments of Cairo and Luxor, Egypt
programme.desc: While the Pyramids of Giza, built as a royal mortuary, reveal the religious beliefs of Egyptian pharaohs, temples, like the Luxor temple, offer a glimpse of ancient Egyptian mythology. The Saladin Citadel, which defines the skyline of Cairo, however, tells stories of the faith of Ottoman rulers. The monuments of Egypt are a testament to the different beliefs that have shaped this country.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico S2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Viajar Mexico S2 Monterrey
programme.desc: In Monterrey, one of Mexico’s ‘Pueblo Magicos’, Charlie heads straight to a canyon, where the locals go to have ‘beer and barbecue’ picnics.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Sabrina Chakici visits Manchester, the city of football and fashion, the city of heritage and hedonism, the city of the industrial revolution.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico S2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Viajar Mexico S2 Santiago
programme.desc: What began as an adventurous getaway in Santiago unexpectedly transforms into a spiritually moving experience for Charlie!

programme.title: Unwind

programme.desc: Indeya Passfield seeks local Maldivian experiences in Hadahaa, where she learns about the ecosystem, local traditions and cuisine.

programme.title: World Heritage

programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Food Fact Fun Vancouver Island, Canada
programme.desc: Alex is in Vancouver Island and calls for Saffron salmon at Modern Cafe. Next he visits “Red fish blue fish” a fish and chip shop and tries freshly prepared seafood. Further explores the Parksville beach for its sand sculptures and then explores a 50 year old Symphony Winery. Further Alex visits “Eagle wing whale watching” for fun and knowledge about the ocean life. To add to the adventure rush he tries motocross and then snorkels in cold waters of Nanaimo.

programme.title: Bliss

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Food Fact Fun Whistler, Canada
programme.desc: Alex starts with Kangaroo meat pie in Whistler with a Australian ginger beer and continuing his food trail he visits Earls kitchen for a tuna dish. He then tries out e-biking and travels in the world’s highest cable car joining Blackcomb with Whistler mountain. Next, he visits Squamish lil’wat cultural center to learn about the Aboriginal people. Finally, he takes a tour of Pemberton valley on a horse, tries Canada’s highest zipline and bungee jumps over the Cheakamus river.
